law.catch_line: A general court-martial may impose one or more of the following penalties:...

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a special court-martial may impose the penalties listed in subsection (a) of this section.
A special court-martial may not impose a fine exceeding $100.

text.section: An enlisted individual convicted of an offense listed in § 13-803 of this subtitle is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
A sentence of dismissal from the service or dishonorable discharge imposed by a court-martial may not be executed until approved by the Governor.
